title: Admin Users: Promote user to Admin

requirements.summary: Update Admin > Users page to search/select a user (including "Uday Chougule") and promote them to Admin with success/error feedback and refreshed role indicator.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Users UI provides a clear "Make Admin" action for a user row or for a searched/selected user.
Triggering the action calls the backend promotion capability and shows success/error feedback in English.
After successful promotion, the UI refreshes and shows that the user is now an Admin (role indicator updates).

file_operations.description: Add React Query hooks to (1) find users by exact profile name via the backend capability (e.g., for "Uday Chougule") and (2) promote a selected user principal to admin using the backend capability; handle authorization traps as user-friendly English errors. Use the selected "authorization" component patterns for authenticated/role-based access flows; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace the static demo users table with an admin-only user lookup/list powered by the new hooks: include an exact-name search (prefill or quick action for "Uday Chougule"), render search results as rows, show a clear per-row "Make Admin" action (disabled/hidden when already admin), and display English success/error feedback (and refresh/optimistically update the row role indicator after promotion). Use the selected "authorization" component guidance to handle unauthorized errors gracefully; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
